article.content:
Galaxy is used in systems biology and was included in several presentations at ISCB 2018:

Topic Contact
EpiMOLAS: a web-based system for genome-wide DNA methylation analysis Sheng-Yao Su
Metabolic characterization of metabolic syndrome: evidence from cross-sectional and longitudinal data Blandine Comte
